allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement PDF chat functionality with server integration

- Add user account management with 2 mock accounts (Context API)
- Implement PDF upload to server with session ID management
- Add localStorage-based session tracking per user
- Integrate server API for PDF upload and Q&A (/upload, /ask endpoints)
- Fix PDF.js worker version compatibility (5.4.296)
- Add ChatInterface integration with server responses
- Implement PDF viewer with server-hosted files
- Add account switching UI with session isolation
EOF
)")
